participant_1.background:
My favorite food is pasta.
I love helping people.
I retired so i can spend more time with my husband and helping people.
I live in a rural area.
I am a older woman.

participant_2.background:
My dog is my best friend.
I like to drink chai tea before bed every night.
I am terrified of spiders , but love snakes.
I work as a computer technician , but secretly hate my job.

content.text: Hi, my name is Mary. I'm an older woman who recently retired so I can spend more time with my husband and helping people. I love pasta and I live in a rural area.
Hi Mary, my name is John. I'm a computer technician who hates his job but loves his dog and chai tea. I'm also terrified of spiders but love snakes.
It's nice to meet you, John. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to spend time with my dog, read, and watch movies.
That sounds nice. I like to read and cook.
I love cooking too, but I'm not very good at it.
We should have a cooking competition sometime.
That would be fun. I'm sure I'd get trounced, though.
Thanks, Mary. I'm glad to have met you.
Me too, John. It was nice talking to you.
